A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What are the critics smoking?  The problems with this movie are so numerous that I don't have time to list them all.  Fans of this movie will say\, \"it's a bold new direction.\"  I will say it's a blunder that not only dooms itself\, but ruins the direction of the third installment.  ... oh\, by the way\, BB8 pilots an AT-ST ... this is your Star Wars critics!  Look at it!  Look at it!
